name: Johann Gottlieb Fichte
school_tradition: German Idealism, German Romanticism, Neo-Kantianism, Post-Kantianism
main_interests: Self-consciousness and Self-awareness, Moral Philosophy, Political Philosophy
influences: Immanuel Kant, Karl Leonhard Reinhold, Salomon Maimon
notable_ideas: absolute consciousness, thesis-antithesis-synthesis, the not-I, striving, mutual recognition
